projects.title: Workout Tracker
projects.desc: A responsive workout tracker application, that allows users to create and delete workouts, helping them stay organized and manage their workout activities effectively. All workouts are stored and retrieved from a non-relational database MongoDB.

projects.title: Framer Motion Templates
projects.desc: This project features a collection of animations implemented using Framer Motion, inspired by various tutorials and examples found on YouTube. The web page is designed to be user-friendly and visually appealing. Implemented a user-friendly design

projects.title: Gallery Drop
projects.desc: A functional and responsive image gallery that presents a collection of images in a visually appealing manner. The gallery includes a login feature, allowing authenticated users to access the gallery page. Once logged in, users can utilize the drag-and-drop functionality to easily select, drag, and rearrange images within the gallery.

projects.title: Bloom Website
projects.desc: Specialized in frontend development for Bloom, a web app that secured 3rd place out of 100+ entries in the Technology for Good Hackathon by community-based development partners (CBDP). Bloom supports expecting mothers with personalized pregnancy tracking, access to specialist doctors, and informative blog articles as well as empowers mothers with comprehensive support and vital information throughout their pregnancy journey. Collaborated with backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless user experiences.

projects.title: Quik Invoice
projects.desc: A solution for handling business payments using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js). Specialized in Frontend Development and collaborated with product design to build the website and backend developers to integrate RESTful APIs. This application streamlines payment processes, offering efficiency and reliability for your business needs.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.desc: A responsive task tracker application that enables users to create and delete tasks, helping them stay organized and manage their daily activities efficiently. The application features a user-friendly interface designed for optimal usability.

projects.title: Meme Generator
projects.desc: A responsive web application Looking to unleash your inner comedian and conquer the internet with humor? Look no further! The Meme Generator is here to transform your everyday moments into viral sensations.
